card.name: Bag of Gold
card.text: +1 Action Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck. (This is not in the Supply.)

card.name: Diadem
card.text: Worth $2. When you play this, +$1 per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card). (This is not in the Supply.)

card.name: Followers
card.text: +2 Cards Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

card.name: Princess
card.text: +1 Buy ________________ While this is in play, cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0. (This is not in the Supply.)

card.name: Trusty Steed
card.text: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +$2; or gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile. (This is not in the Supply.)

card.name: Hamlet
card.text: +1 Card +1 Action You may discard a card; If you do +1 Action. You may discard a card; If you do +1 Buy

card.name: Fortune Teller
card.text: +2 Coin Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory of Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

card.name: Menagerie
card.text: +1 Action Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

card.name: Farming Village
card.text: +2 Actions Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

card.name: Horse Traders
card.text: +1 Buy +3 Coin Discard 2 Cards ________________ When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

card.name: Remake
card.text: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand then gain a card costing exactly 1 more than the trashed card.

card.name: Tournament
card.text: +1 Action Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

card.name: Young Witch
card.text: +2 Cards Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse. ______________________ Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 or 3 to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

card.name: Harvest
card.text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

card.name: Horn of Plenty
card.text: 0 Coins When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it’s a Victory card, trash this.

card.name: Hunting Party
card.text: +1 Card +1 Action Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn’t in a duplicate of one in your hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Jester
card.text: +2 Coins Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it’s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

card.name: Fairgrounds
card.text: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)
